alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 10:58AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pershing County through 1130 AM PDT... At 1056 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over I-80 near Oreana moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects and vehicles are possible. Heavy rainfall could lead to blinding downpours and ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112). MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
